mapper.select: WITH MostOrderedCategories AS ( SELECT p.category_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM product_order o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = :customerId GROUP BY p.category_id ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT 1 ), MostLikedCategories AS ( SELECT p.category_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM product_favorite f JOIN product p ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.customer_id = :customerId GROUP BY p.category_id ORDER BY like_count DESC LIMIT 1 ), RecommendedCategories AS ( SELECT category_id FROM MostOrderedCategories UNION SELECT category_id FROM MostLikedCategories ) SELECT * FROM product WHERE category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM RecommendedCategories) LIMIT 5;
